Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Laursen Kristensen Oddershede's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Laursen Kristensen Oddershede is a 46 year old Family Office Executive from Denmark. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Laursen Kristensen Oddershede is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Laursen finished secondary school at Holstebro Gymnasium in 1997.
Laursen finished his studies at University of Copenhagen in 2001.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 23 years, Laursen Kristensen Oddershede brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
At Nykur Private Banking, Laursen Kristensen Oddershede held the position of Financial Advisor from 2002 to 2003, developing essential skills in the field.
In 2005, he moved to Jyske Bank Private Banking to work as a Portfolio Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
In 2009, he joined Danske Bank Wealth Management as a Wealth Manager, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
After 9 years of dedication, he assumed the role of Family Office Executive at Nordea Private Banking Danmark in 2013, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
